Luna Park Hotel, Paris

1 Rue Jacquard, Paris
From 21.11€

Price per person per night (VAT included)

Book now
Best Price Guarantee
Relax, you've got the best price possible. If you see the same offer for less on another website, we'll refund you the difference.
BudgetPartner
  • Overview
  • Reviews
  • Map

 
 

Overview

This basic 1-star hotel in Paris is conveniently situated in the 11th arrondissement, just a short walk away from the Canal Saint-Martin and the rue Oberkampf, famous for its nightlife.

The Luna Park Hotel offers 36 simple rooms, with a private or shared bathroom, all with a TV, telephone and Wi-Fi. The hotel also has a 24-hour reception service, a TV lounge, a left-luggage office, and a safe.

The hotel is located near the Place de la Bastille in a vibrant area of Paris, full of bars and cafés. The famous Père Lachaise cemetery, where Jim Morrison is buried, is just a 20-minute walk away. You can pick up metro services at the Place de la République, 10 minutes away on foot, to top sights across the city: get to the Louvre in 10 minutes, Invalides and the Eiffel Tower in 15 minutes, and the Gare du Nord in just 5 minutes.
